text: ...If I were to say I'm proud...?

Bright, positive, and earnest─
─continuing to strive forward as if it's natural.

Today's results are a testament to that─
─and it's the future of the Chocolate Idol, right?

...If that's the case?
I can't forget about the talented Producer-san!

The existence of the Chocolate Idol...
...relies on Producer-san!
